excerpt: #  EXODUS 34 can be used to teach...Some really cool features of Exodus 34
content:
#  EXODUS 34 can be used to teach...Some really cool features of Exodus 34

- [ ] There are multiple Sinai Covenants
- [ ] God made a Sinai covenant with Moshe to repropagate/ restore the first Sinai covenant
- [ ] God makes new covenants to restore previous Covenants being desecrated or ruined ontologically
- [ ] Good does share his glory with a man
- [ ] after the golden calf image of Yahweh Covenant break, God shares the image of his glory with the man moshe and reveals his heavenly image through an earthly man
- [ ] the Yahweh formula
